name: Singers in TV Shows Quiz | Other Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: What show featured the singer of 'Jessie's Girl'?
questions.explanation:
General Hospital.

	Rick Springfield played Dr. Noah Drake.

questions.text: What show starred the singer of the song 'Let Her In'?
questions.explanation:
Welcome Back Kotter.

	The song was done by John Travolta.

questions.text: What show starred the singer of 'Johnny Angel'?
questions.explanation:
Coach.

	The song was by Shelly Fabares

questions.text: What show starred the singer of 'Going back to Cali'?
questions.explanation:
In the House.

	The Song was by L L Cool J.

questions.text: What show starred the singer of 'Control'?
questions.explanation:
Good Times.

	The song was done by Janet Jackson.

questions.text: What show starred the singer of 'They Don't Know'?
questions.explanation:
The Tracy Ullman Show.

	The song was done by Tracy Ullman herself.

questions.text: What show starred the singer of 'Da Doo Ron Ron'?
questions.explanation:
The Hardy Boys.

	The Song was done by Shaun Cassidy.

questions.text: The Group 'The New Radicals' had a backup singer that started out on a TV Show, What Show?
questions.explanation:
Archie Bunker's Place.

	The backup singer was Danielle Brisbois who played Archie's Niece that lived with him.

questions.text: What show starred the singers who did the song 'Soul Man'?
questions.explanation:
Saturday Night Live.

	The song was done by The Blues Brothers, also known as Dan Ackroyd and John Belushi.

questions.text: What show starred the singer of 'All I Need'?
questions.explanation:
General Hospital.

	The song was done by Jack Wagner who was also in 'Melrose Place'.
